      • transferFile

        public static boolean transferFile(java.lang.String username,
                   java.lang.String password,
                   java.lang.String host,
                   java.io.File file,
                   FileTransferProtocol transferProtocol)
                            throws ApplicationException
        Transfer a file to remote destination via JSCH library using sFTP protocol
        Parameters:
        username - String remote SFTP server user name.
        password - String remote SFTP server user password
        host - String remote SFTP server IP address or host name.
        file - File to transfer to SFTP Server.
        transferProtocol - protocol to transfer a file. FileTransferProtocol
        Returns:
        boolean true if file is transfered otherwise false.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException
